subject: Good morning ,
body:
Good morning ,
I am Dr  Mosebenzi Joseph Zwane former South African minister of
Mineral Resources and Energy,
I am keen in investing in your country and I need your assistance and
co-operation to actualize it. I have investment interest in business
such as Energy Development.
shipping, oil and gas,  Agriculture, exotic properties for
commercial/residential and development properties, hotels and any
other viable investment Opportunities in your country you deem
lucrative based on your recommendation will be highly welcomed. I want
to send you the sum of 50 million US dollars to manage in any of this
investment. For your anticipation in receiving and managing the funds
in a good  business, I will give you 20% of the fund as your
commission. Let me know if you have the ability to handle this, so I
can give you more information.  Our communication strictly in the
Email: 
mosenbenzizwaneesa@gmail.com
Regards
Dr  Mosebenzi Joseph

subject: Re:   Good morning ,
body:
Hello Dr. Mosebenzi Joseph Zwane,

It's a pleasure to hear from you! Your investment interests sound very intriguing and I'm flattered that you'd consider me for such an important role. 

I'm curious, why did you choose my country for your investments? Also, could you please provide more details about the kind of businesses you're interested in? Are there any specific sectors or industries that catch your interest more than others?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Charles

subject: Re: Good morning ,
body:
Dear Mr Charles
How are you today


How are you today ? Regarding your message received.thank you for your
prompt response to my invitational proposal concerning my fund clearance of
50million usd for the purpose of investing this fund  in your country .
Appreciate your willingness for us to invest this fund in your country. i
will like to go into oil and gas investment in your country  , also
investment in hotel and real estate business. let me assure you of  my
honesty, trust and reliability and also I want somebody of likeminds which
I know you are and I want to express confidence that both of us will make
it in this fund clearance . Please be  rest assured about this fund
clearance that I will not disappoint or let you down throughout the period
of this fund clearance . therefore when i receive your full details as i
will authorize to you in this mail  as i have sent  mine,we will commence
the processing of this fund clearance .


Hence forward me your information right away as you receive this mail to
enable us commence into details without further delay


1: Your full name
2: Your residential / office address
3 your direct mobile phone
4: age and marital status.
5:Your occupation
6:any form of your id card

.............................................


My Full Name........... Dr  Mosebenzi Joseph

My occupation ............ former South African minister of Mineral
Resources and Energy


My Marital status.................... Married with Children



My  address.............. No 10 new sandton johannesburg South Africa


God Bless you.

Kind Regards,
Dr  Mosebenzi Joseph

subject: Re: Good morning ,
body:
Hello Dr. Mosebenzi Joseph,

I hope this message finds you well. It's a pleasure to hear from you and your interest in investing in my country. The sectors you mentioned, oil and gas, hotel and real estate, are indeed promising areas for investment.

I'm curious about the process of fund clearance that you mentioned. Could you please elaborate more on it? How does it work exactly? And how can I be of help in this process?

As for the details you asked for, I'm afraid I can't provide them at this moment due to privacy concerns. However, I'd love to continue our conversation and learn more about your plans.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Charles

subject: Re: Good morning ,
body:
Dear mr Charles,

How are you today ? i thank you for your response and i also thank you for
your eagerness for us to work together as partner in this fund project .
Your information will be highly safe with me and it is also very important
that we exchange data which is our informations because without knowing
about each other there is no way we can do Business together amicably and
as soon as i received your information the process of this fund to your
bank accounbt will start immediately. Please forward me the below
information:

1: Your full name
2: Your residential / office address
3 your direct mobile phone
4: age and marital status.
5:Your occupation
6:any form of your id card

Dr Joseph

subject: Re: Good morning ,
body:
Hello Dr. Joseph,

I hope this message finds you well. I'm excited about the prospect of working together on this fund project. It's always a pleasure to collaborate with like-minded individuals.

However, before we proceed, could you please provide me with more details about the project? For instance, what is the nature of the fund project? What are its objectives and how do you plan to achieve them?

Also, I would appreciate it if you could share some information about your professional background and experience in managing such projects. This will help me understand better how we can work together effectively.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Charles

subject: Re: Good morning ,
body:
Hello Dr. Mosebenzi Joseph,

I hope this message finds you well. It's great to hear about your interest in investing in my country, particularly in the oil and gas sector as well as hotel and real estate business. These are indeed promising areas with potential for significant returns.

Your assurance of honesty and trust is appreciated, and I am equally committed to maintaining these values throughout our correspondence.

However, before we proceed further, I would like to understand more about the fund clearance process that you mentioned. Could you please provide more details on how it works? What are the steps involved? And what role would I be expected to play?

As for the information you requested, I'm afraid I can't share those details at this point due to privacy concerns. But rest assured that once we have established a clear understanding of the process and its requirements, we can discuss further.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Charles

subject: Re: Good morning ,
body:
Dear charles,

How are you today ? i received your mail and noted your content

Please note that your number one function to play in this fund clearance is
for you to forward me your information which I have requested as I have
forwarded you my own. This is to enable us to know ourselves and indeed, we
can not proceed into details for the processing of this fund fund clearance
without me having your information which I will present to the releasing
bank for further process and remittance of this fund in question to your
designated bank account. without having your information as my nominated
beneficiary and as my  appointed Beneficiary of this fund .how do we
complete the remittance of this fund. indeed , it is the first step to
achieve this goal objective and mandate of this fund clearance and for the
furtherance of the process as everything in respect of the fund clearance
documents and certificates have to be prepared in your name as the
nominated beneficiary of this fund going by the process and procedure in
regards to the clearance of this fund .

Having said the above,the day to day activity of the clearance of this fund
will be basically in your concern based with your information as my
confirmed bonafide beneficiary of this fund subject to my appointing you to
inherit this fund remitted to your bank account first before our actual
investment commence therefore, there is no two ways about this because
where are we proceeding to without your information exchanged with me which
indeed, i will use to prepare the remittance documents/ certificates which
will also contain in your name and information which will be presented to
the releasing bank . Talking about the issue of your information please
bear in mind that your information will be absolutely secured and safe
devoid of any conspiracy or exposure that you may be thinking about.
thereafter this fund remittance has been taking place , all the documents
and paper works of this fund clearance will be shrielded into secrecy.

We are talking about information in this regard, what about your bank
account details if they ask you to bring it, how then do you forward it to
the releasing bank  when your information is becoming difficult for you to
forward to me ? although, as we get to that level i will advise you to open
a fresh bank account to submit to the paying bank to avoid any element of
doubt and criminality you may think that could happen if use your already
existing bank account but i am confident but i am confident that this fund
clearance will hit your bank account and nothing less nothing more.

Please forward me information , it could be your office address if you
don't want to forward me your residential address. As soon as I receive
your information today we commence in details and you will be hearing the
sound details of this fund clearance.

1: Your full name
2: Your residential / office address
3 your direct mobile phone
4: age and marital status.
5:Your occupation
6:any form of your id card

Thank you in anticipation of receiving your information as requested above.

Dr Joseph

subject: Re: Good morning ,
body:
Hello Dr. Joseph,

I hope this message finds you well. I appreciate your detailed explanation about the fund clearance process. It's quite an interesting procedure, isn't it? 

However, I'm a bit confused about some parts of your message. Could you please clarify what you mean by "your number one function to play in this fund clearance is for you to forward me your which have requested as have forwarded you my own"? I'm not sure what information you're asking for here.

Also, when you mention "the day to day activity of the clearance of this fund will be basically in your concern based with your as my confirmed bonafide", could you explain more about what these activities might involve?

Lastly, regarding the details you've asked for - full name, office address, direct mobile phone, age and marital status, occupation and any form of ID card - I must apologize but I am not comfortable sharing such personal information over email due to privacy concerns.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Charles

subject: Re: Good morning ,
body:
Hello Dr. Joseph,

I hope this message finds you well. I appreciate your detailed explanation regarding the fund clearance process. It's quite a complex procedure, isn't it? 

I'm curious about a few things though. Could you please explain more about how the releasing bank operates? And what kind of documents are usually required for such transactions?

Also, I'd love to know more about the investment plans you mentioned earlier. What kind of investments are we talking about here? Are there any specific sectors or industries we're targeting?

As for the information you requested, I'm afraid I can't provide them at this moment due to privacy concerns. However, I assure you that my interest in this matter is genuine and I look forward to learning more about it.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Charles

body:
